The George Brown College offers various services and tools for faculty. These include:
1. Career Services: workshops, events, an online job board, and resource materials.
2. Cornerstone (My Learning): the collegeâ€™s professional development portal.
3. FacultyConnect: an online hub of videos featuring George Brown College's own faculty sharing concrete practices.
4. iTAC (Instructional Technology Assistance Centre): provides support for classroom and event computers, projectors, screens, microphones, and more.
5. Partial Load faculty have priority to teach specific courses again if there has not been a substantial change in the course.
6. The TLX supports excellence in teaching and learning, offering a wide range of services for faculty.
7. Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
8. Social Media Hub: Visit for more information.
9. Land acknowledgment: Learn more about it.
10. Sign up for application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more.
11. Contact email for inquiries: ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
12. Phone number for inquiries: 416-415-2000.
13. TTY number for inquiries: 1-877-515-5559.
14. Information on social media hubs is available but not explicitly stated.
